changelog:
- Major Update: Beta 7

- New Module Manager
• Manage flashed modules easily
• Enable, disable, or remove modules directly
• Added swipe-to-refresh for easier updates

- UI Updates & Improvements
• Refined overall design for consistency
• Added short descriptions in Settings for better clarity

- Download Section Enhancements
• Optimized search to prevent overlapping API calls
• Smoother and faster module browsing

- Fixes
• Adjusted minor layouts
• Improved some settings behavior
• General performance optimizations
